title: Enhancing Instructional Practice Competencies: Exploring the Linkage Between Team Learning and Organizational Learning: Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of organizational behavior and team dynamics, along with experience in literature analysis methodologies
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three interactions between team learning processes and organizational learning mechanisms through literature analysis.
Learners can evaluate the impact of dynamic team learning structures on organizational performance using quantitative and qualitative metrics based on case studies.
Learners can develop a team learning design framework in a constrained mobile environment and apply it to real work scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
